Header: Several injured in Borella lorry collision (Video)
Content: Two lorries collided at the Borella prison Junction early Wednesday morning. A mini lorry travelling from Borella to Dematagoda rammed into another lorry which was travelling ahead. The driver of the mini lorry and two of its assistants sustained injuries and are currently receiving treatment at the National Hospital. The Police Media Spokesperson’s office stated that the driver of the other lorry has been taken into custody by the Borella Police. // <![CDATA[(function(d, s, id) {  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.3";  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));// ]]> Two lorries collided into each other at the Borella prison Junction early this morning Posted by Newsfirst.lk on Tuesday, March 31, 2015
